content.body:
I'll send out an agenda for tomorrow's Numerics breakout soon. I was thinking, roughly:

1. Takeaways from TPAC (10 minutes)
2. Longer-term vision for numerics, including Amount and Decimal, and which use cases each proposal aims to solve (30 minutes)
3. Discuss Amount design concerns with Olivier (30 minutes)
4. Plans for TC39 this week (20 minutes)
5. Buffer (30 minutes)

wdyt?
